subject: Track and Field
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Donald Thomas won the N.C.A.A. indoor title in March, and came to the Division I outdoor championships as the college leader this season at 7-8 and the co-world leader with Aike Onnen of Germany.
snippet: Donald Thomas won the N.C.A.A. indoor title in March, and came to the Division I outdoor championships as the college leader this season at 7-8 and the co-world leader with Aike Onnen of Germany.
